Package interfaces

Interface CollectionSiteInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollectionSite
    public interface CollectionSiteInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Collection Site where Master Thief intelligence and paintings are stored.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      char appraiseSit()
      Called by Master Thief to appraise situation: either to take a rest, prepare assault party or sum up results.
      int collectACanvas()
      Called by Master Thief to collect all available canvas - Synchronization point between Master Thief and each individual Ordinary Thief with a canvas.
      int getNextAssaultPartyID()
      Get the number of the next Assault Party and remove it from the queue.
      int getNextRoom()
      Gets the next room which is not empty.
      int getPaintings()
      Getter for the total number of paintings acquired.
      int getRoomDistance​(int room)
      Gets the distance to a room.
      int getRoomPaintings​(int room)
      Gets the number of paintings for a given room.
      int handACanvas​(int assaultParty, int ordinaryThief)
      Called by the Ordinary Thief to hand a canvas to the Master Thief if they have any - Synchronization point between each Ordinary Thief and the Master Thief.
      void shutdown()
      Sends the shutdown signal to the Collection Site.
      int startOperations()
      Called by Master Thief to initiate operations.
      int takeARest()
      Master Thief waits while there are still Assault Parties in operation.

    • Method Detail

      • startOperations

        int startOperations()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called by Master Thief to initiate operations.
        Returns:
        the updated state of the Master Thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • appraiseSit

        char appraiseSit()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called by Master Thief to appraise situation: either to take a rest, prepare assault party or sum up results.
        Returns:
        the next situation ('P' for preparing a party, 'R' for taking a rest or 'E' to end the heist and sum up results)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • takeARest

        int takeARest()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Master Thief waits while there are still Assault Parties in operation.
        Returns:
        the updated state of the Master Thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • collectACanvas

        int collectACanvas()
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called by Master Thief to collect all available canvas - Synchronization point between Master Thief and each individual Ordinary Thief with a canvas.
        Returns:
        the updated state of the Master Thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • handACanvas

        int handACanvas​(int assaultParty,
                int ordinaryThief)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called by the Ordinary Thief to hand a canvas to the Master Thief if they have any - Synchronization point between each Ordinary Thief and the Master Thief.
        Parameters:
        assaultParty - the identification of the Assault Party the thief belongs to
        ordinaryThief - the identification of the Ordinary Thief
        Returns:
        the updated state of the Ordinary Thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • getNextAssaultPartyID

        int getNextAssaultPartyID()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the number of the next Assault Party and remove it from the queue.
        Returns:
        the identification of the Assault Party
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends the shutdown signal to the Collection Site.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • getNextRoom

        int getNextRoom()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the next room which is not empty.
        Returns:
        the identification of the next room
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • getRoomPaintings

        int getRoomPaintings​(int room)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the number of paintings for a given room.
        Parameters:
        room - the room identification
        Returns:
        the number of paintings
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed
